page.title: 02COMMUTING IN SEAHAM HARBOUR
page.content: THE MAIN BUS STATION IN SEAHAM IS IN THE TOWN CENTRE.BUSES GO TO SEVERAL DIFFERENT PLACES.THERE ARE LOCAL BUSES THAT TRAVEL AROUND THE TOWN.THEY GO TO PARKSIDE,DAWDON AND MOUNT PLEASANT. THEY RUN ABOUT EVERY TWENTY FIVE MINUTES.NO BUSES PASS THROUGH DALTON LE DALE.OTHER BUSES GO TO MURTON,PETERLEE,DURHAM,SUNDERLAND AND NEWCASTLE.IT TAKES 45 MINUTES TO TRAVEL TO DURHAM BY BUS.IT TAKES 25 MINUTES TO GO TO SUNDERLAND BUT IF YOU CATCH THE EXPRESS BUS YOU CAN BE IN NEWCASTLE IN 30 MINUTES. THE RAILWAY STATION IS IN STATION ROAD.TRAINS GO TO SUNDERLAND AND NEWCASTLE IN THE NORTH AND MIDDLESBROUGH IN THE SOUTH.THERE IS A HARBOUR IN SEAHAM.SHIPS CARRY THEIR CARGOES ALL OVER THE WORLD.NO PASSENGERS ARE TAKEN FROM SEAHAM HARBOUR.
